title: Zero-Coupon Bond Price
notes: This equation prices a zero-coupon bond

title: Coupon Bond Price
equation: P = \sum_{t=1}^{n} \frac{C}{(1 + y)^{t}} + \frac{F}{(1 + y)^{n}} = \underbrace{\frac{C}{y} \left[1 - (1 + y)^{-n}\right]}_{\text{annuity factor}} + \underbrace{\frac{F}{(1 + y)^{n}}}_{\text{principal PV}}
notes: This equation decomposes coupon bond pricing into annuity and lump-sum components

title: Bond Price with Semi-Annual Coupons
notes: This equation captures semi-annual compounding conventions in bond markets

title: Macaulay Duration
notes: This equation calculates Macaulay duration

title: Modified Duration
notes: This equation transforms Macaulay duration into price sensitivity measure

title: Effective Duration
notes: This equation measures duration for bonds with embedded options

title: Convexity
equation: C = \frac{\sum_{t=1}^{n} t(t+1) \times \frac{CF_{t}}{(1 + y)^{t+2}}}{P} = \frac{1}{P(1 + y)^{2}} \frac{\partial^{2} P}{\partial y^{2}}
notes: This equation measures the curvature of the bond price-yield relationship

title: Price Change Approximation
equation: \frac{\Delta P}{P} \approx -D_{\text{mod}} \times \Delta y + \frac{1}{2} C \times (\Delta y)^{2} = \frac{\partial P}{P} + \frac{1}{2} \frac{\partial^{2} P}{P} (\Delta y)
notes: This equation provides the second-order Taylor approximation of bond price changes

title: Spot Rate Bootstrapping
notes: This equation extracts the term structure of spot rates from market bond prices

title: Forward Rate
notes: Bonds and Fixed Income

title: Z-Spread
equation: Z = y - y_{\text{spot}} = \frac{1}{D_{\text{mac}}} \ln\left( \frac{\text{bond price}}{\text{spot PV of CFs}} \right)
notes: This equation calculates the constant spread over the spot curve that prices a bond correctly

title: Option-Adjusted Spread
notes: This equation calculates the spread after adjusting for embedded options

title: Effective Convexity
notes: This equation measures convexity for bonds with embedded options

title: DV01
notes: This equation quantifies interest rate risk in dollar terms

title: Clean Price
notes: This equation separates quoted prices from settlement prices

title: Accrued Interest
equation: A = C \times \frac{d}{D} = C \times \frac{\text{days held}}{\text{days in period}}
notes: This equation calculates interest earned but not yet paid

title: Bond Equivalent Yield
notes: This equation annualizes T-bill discount yields for comparison with coupon bonds

title: Callable Bond Price
notes: P_{\text{straight}} - P_{\text{call}})

title: Convertible Bond Price
notes: Bonds and Fixed Income

title: Mortgage-Backed Security Price
notes: This equation prices mortgage-backed securities with changing cash flows

title: Average Life
equation: AL = \frac{\sum_{t=1}^{n} t \times \frac{CF_{t}}{(1 + y)^{t}}}{\sum_{t=1}^{n} \frac{CF_{t}}{(1 + y)^{t}}} = \frac{\sum t \times PV(CF_{t})}{\sum PV(CF_{t})}
notes: This equation calculates the expected duration of mortgage-backed securities
